Song.title: Grace Greater Than Our Sin
Song.copyright: Words by Julia Johnston Music by Daniel Towner Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]Marvelous [D/F#]grace of our [Em]loving [Em7]Lord, [D]Grace that ex[D7]ceeds our [C]sin and [D]our [G/B]guilt! [G]Yonder on [D/F#]Calvary’s [Em]mount out[Em7]poured, [Am7]There where [G/B]the [C]blood{,} [G/B]of [Am7]the [Dsus]Lamb [D]was [G]spilled.
Chorus: [G]Grace, grace, [C]God’s [G/B]grace, [D]Grace that will [D7]pardon and [C]cleanse with[G/B]in; [G]Grace, grace, [C]God’s [G/B]grace, [Am]Grace that [G/B]is [C]great[G/B]er [Am7]than [Dsus]all [D]our [G]sin.
Verse 2: [G]Sin and des[D/F#]pair, like the [Em]sea waves [Em7]cold, [D]Threaten the [D7]soul with [C]infi[D]nite [G/B]loss; [G]Grace that is [D/F#]greater, yes, [Em]grace un[Em7]told, [Am7]Points to [G/B]the [C]re[G/B]fuge, [Am7]the [Dsus]migh[D]ty [G]cross.
Verse 3: [G]Dark is the [D/F#]stain that we [Em]cannot [Em7]hide. [D]What can av[D7]ail to [C]wash it [D]a[G/B]way? [G]Look! There is [D/F#]flowing a [Em]crimson [Em7]tide, [Am7]Brighter [G/B]than [C]snow, [G/B]you [Am7]may [Dsus]be [D]to[G]day.
Verse 4: [G]Marvelous, [D/F#]infinite, [Em]matchless [Em7]grace, [D]Freely bes[D7]towed on [C]all who [D]be[G/B]lieve! [G]You that are [D/F#]longing to [Em]see His [Em7]face, [Am7]Will you [G/B]this [C]mo[G/B]ment [Am7]His [Dsus]grace [D]re[G]ceive?
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 marvelous grace of our loving lord grace that exceeds our sin and our guilt yonder on calvarys mount outpoured there where the blood of the lamb was spilled chorus grace grace gods grace grace that will pardon and cleanse within grace grace gods grace grace that is greater than all our sin verse 2 sin and despair like the sea waves cold threaten the soul with infinite loss grace that is greater yes grace untold points to the refuge the mighty cross verse 3 dark is the stain that we cannot hide what can avail to wash it away look there is flowing a crimson tide brighter than snow you may be today verse 4 marvelous infinite matchless grace freely bestowed on all who believe you that are longing to see his face will you this moment his grace receive

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]Marvelous [D]grace of our [G]lov[D/F#]ing [Em]Lord, [D]Grace that exceeds our [G]sin and [C]our [G/B]guilt! [G]Yonder on [D]Calvary’s [G]mount [D/F#]out[Em]poured, [C]There where [G/B]the [Am]blood{,} [G/B]of [C]the [G/B]Lamb [D]was [G]spilled.
Chorus: [G]Grace, grace, [C]God’s [G/B]grace, [D]Grace that will pardon and [G]cleanse [C]with[G/B]in; [G]Grace, grace, [C]God’s [G/B]grace, [Am]Grace that [G/B]is [C]great[G/B]er [Am]than [G/D]all [D]our [G]sin.
Verse 2: [G]Sin and des[D]pair, like the [G]sea [D/F#]waves [Em]cold, [D]Threaten the soul with [G]infi[C]nite [G/B]loss; [G]Grace that is [D]greater, yes, [G]grace [D/F#]un[Em]told, [C]Points to [G/B]the [Am]re[G/B]fuge, [C]the [G/B]migh[D]ty [G]cross.
Verse 3: [G]Dark is the [D]stain that we [G]can[D/F#]not [Em]hide. [D]What can avail to [G]wash it [C]a[G/B]way? [G]Look! There is [D]flowing a [G]crim[D/F#]son [Em]tide, [C]Brighter [G/B]than [Am]snow, [G/B]you [C]may [G/B]be [D]to[G]day.
Verse 4: [G]Marvelous, [D]infinite, [G]match[D/F#]less [Em]grace, [D]Freely bestowed on [G]all who [C]be[G/B]lieve! [G]You that are [D]longing to [G]see [D/F#]His [Em]face, [C]Will you [G/B]this [Am]mo[G/B]ment [C]His [G/B]grace [D]re[G]ceive?
